original_text: Whose hatred is covered by deceit, his wickedness shall be shewed before the whole congregation.
korean_text: 속임으로 그 미움을 감출지라도 그의 악이 회중 앞에 드러나리라

sentences.original_text: Whose hatred is covered by deceit
his wickedness shall be shewed before the whole congregation
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 악함은 온 회중 앞에 드러나리라
